name: Creative Labs GigaWorks T3 80 W 2.1-Channel Speakers
Features: [Elegant and compact speakers, Exceptional audiophile quality drivers that deliver full midrange and scintillatingly clear highs, Powerful SLAM design subwoofer, Featuring Creative SLAM (Symmetrically Loaded Acoustic Module) technology, a high power output subwoofer delivers excellent dynamics for deep, tight bass., Volume control pod, Low friction volume dial with auxiliary input and headphone connection for private listening, New level of audio excellence, Be amazed by the powerful audio and experience the big sound in your music, games and movies. Plus, the Eco-friendly Low Standby Power technology for minimal power consumption in standby mode.]
